pageContext.claim: “We have the best lowest number in carbon emissions, which is a big standard that I notice Obama goes with all the time. Not Joe, I haven't heard Joe use the term because I'm not sure he knows what it represents or means, but I have heard Obama use it and we have the best carbon emission numbers that we've had in 35 years under this administration.”
pageContext.analysis: Under Trump, the United States experienced the biggest spike in carbon emissions in 2018 since 2000.
